articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: Chipotle doesn't want you to eat at its newest restaurant - CNN
articles.description: Roughly half of Chipotle's sales were completed on its app or website last quarter, so it's opening a first-of-its-kind restaurant to reflect that.
